meanings.definition: A volatile flammable liquid used as fuel in internal combustion engines.
meanings.sent2: The gasoline station is just around the corner.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled gasoline on my shoes, now they smell like a gas station!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like gasoline, igniting joy in everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The smell of gasoline lingered in the air, reminding me of road trips with my family.

meanings.sent1: I need to gasoline my car before the long drive.
meanings.sent2: He will gasoline the generator to keep the power running.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to gasoline the grill with extra fuel for a faster cookout.
meanings.sent4: She hoped to gasoline her motivation with some inspirational quotes.
meanings.sent5: The gardener will gasoline the lawnmower to trim the grass neatly.
